metadata.name: Lower World - Ride the snake
metadata.description: burst_ SuperRare series 01 / artwork 1 / Lower World - Ride the snake: I play snake and listen to an ancient song which goes “.. ride the snake, ride the snake, to the lake, the ancient lake, baby. The snake, he’s long, seven miles, ride the snake, he’s old and his skin is cold..“ (Quote by: Lyrics from The doors - The end) In shamanic traditions the lower world is symbolic of the universal consciousness, the total human experience, the collective unconscious. Every experience, thought, horror and joy lingers in this world. In this deep place we encounter a potential shadow side but we can confront the shadow in the lower world through ritual, dancing, art and music. Let’s ride the snake, together. - Sound Design by: burst_ - Huanchaco (Pandemic) 2022, MP4, 14 sec, 2160 × 3040
